item.title: Lower price for N800 in Italy...maybe N810 coming closer?!
item.description:
{.alignright .size-full .wp-image-98 width="246" height="154"}I was looking in the Italian Nokia official shop, and I noticed that the [N800]{style="font-weight: bold;"} price was decreased to [259 €]{style="font-weight: bold;"}instead of [289 €]{style="font-weight: bold;"}You can verify it on the official website.

Maybe the [N810]{style="font-weight: bold;"} is coming closer? Who knows ;)
item.dc:creator: Andrea Grandi
